attributes.action: let the British people decide, by way of referendum, whether an further immigrants should be allowed entry to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country is currently being swamped with immigrants, from all corners of the globe. Within 60 years the original British population will be a minority in their own country. This petition is aimed at allowing the soon to be minority to have have their say and decide whether they want this outcome.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
